name: Asteroids: Driving Home
description:
Dad is driving you home. You're sitting in the back seat, listening to the vibey music and playing your favorite game. You can barely see your console screen. Every 10 seconds car passes, lighting up your screen console.

Controls:

- WASD to MOVE

- SPACE to SHOOT

If you fail, the game will restart, so relax to the catchy tune and shoot some asteroids.
